wikipedia_page.main: Benjamin Wold is currently Professor of Ancient Judaism and Christianity at Trinity College, Dublin, School of Religion (Faculty of Arts, Humanities, and Social Sciences).

response: Among the major studies published on the document are those by Armin Lange (1995), Daniel J. Harrington (1996), Torleif Elgvin (1998), John J. Collins (1999; 2003), Eibert Tigchelaar (2001), Matthew Goff (2003), Cana Werman (2004), Benjamin Wold (2018), and Jean-Sebastian Rey (2009).

link_mentions.page: Journal for the Study of the Pseudepigrapha
